content.question: In The Jungle, Wifredo Lamâ€™s depiction of enigmatic figures with mask-like faces in a surrealistic landscape has been interpreted as a reference to the

choices.label: historical oppression of the indigenous population in Cuba
political tension between the governments of Cuba and the United States
struggles with assimilation faced by modern Cuban immigrants in the United States
creation of an Afro-Cuban identity against the cultural background of slavery

content.answer: creation of an Afro-Cuban identity against the cultural background of slavery

topic.text: 4.4: Theories and Interpretations of Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
